issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
With the 3.5.1. GA SDK additional installed older iOS Simulators through Xcode > Preferences > Downloads cannot be selected via {{--sim-version}}, while {{ti build -h}} does list the installed versions.

h1. Reproduce

1. Run {{ti build -h}} to see the correct values
2. Run {{ti info -t ios}} to see the correct values
3. Run {{ti build -p ios --sim-version ?}} to see the accepted values
4. Run {{ti build -p ios --sim-version X}} with {{X}} being a different then default value to get the error:

{code}
[ERROR] :  Invalid "--sim-version" value "8.0"
   7.1
For help, run: titanium help build
{code}

*NOTE:* This does work with the 4.0.0.RC SDK.

comments.body: Hello, This issue is fixed in the latest SDK release 4.1.0.GA. Thanks.
